timeline.message:
Standardize names of Models types

Also remove TSC.getTable and TC.create, they are no longer part of the
public API

Do not return the created object from create* APIs

Other upsert / merge / update APIs do not have this feature, so it's
inconsistent to return the created object when the other APIs return
void. And since we no longer need it, request that the create* APIs
return no content to reduce the payload size.
Update test recordings to account for the create* API changes

timeline.bodyText: I'm usually not a fan of aligning parameters, because we have some seriously long method/class names and the parameters get mushed against the right margin.
timeline.author: conniey

replies.bodyText: Fair enough, I don't have a strong opinion, so I just went with whatever IntelliJ did by default. If we decide to care more about this we can probably encode it in an editorconfig (or more likely an intellij settings file, since this might be IDE-specific).
replies.author: bsiegel

timeline.bodyText: I'd consider making new ListTablesOptions() a member variable so we don't have to allocate a new object to it for every call.
timeline.author: conniey
